subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On Monday, Andy Pettitte was en route to New York for a physical exam to complete his new contract, and the Yankees agreed to a five-year, $20 million deal with the Japanese star Kei Igawa.
snippet: On Monday, Andy Pettitte was en route to New York for a physical exam to complete his new contract, and the Yankees agreed to a five-year, $20 million deal with the Japanese star Kei Igawa.
